name: Untitled Fighting Game
description:
Prototype of a simple platformer fighting game made for the Secret Santa Game Jam 2021.

Controls
  • Movement: arrow keys.
  • Z + Z + Z -> Basic punch.
  • X -> Pushback punch
  • X + Hold Left or Right -> Pushback punch
  • X + Up (At the same time) -> Uppercut punch
  • X + Down (While jumping) -> Punch from above
  • C -> Special attack

You can make different combinations, e.g: Z + Z + X

Credits

Player Character and Enemy: Penusbmic

https://penusbmic.itch.io/super-ginger-hero

https://penusbmic.itch.io/characterpack1
